title: How to Create Sales Funnels Using Elementor and WordPress
headline: This free online course will teach you how to create stunning landing pages and a high-converting sales funnel for free.
description: Do you plan to sell your product on the internet? Have you considered keeping track of traffic as it progresses from leads to customers? We'll show you how to use WordPress and Elementor to build landing pages, sales pages and even entire high-converting sales funnels for your products, offers and services. By the end of this course, you will have the skills required to create exceptional and high-converting landing pages. Enrol now!
courseDescription:
A ‘sales funnel’ is the marketing term that represents the path potential customers take before purchasing a product or service. The first step of this journey opens potential customers to the awareness of the products or services. You do this step by creating attractive landing and sales pages. Have you ever purchased a course, particular software or any product online? Then you've probably been taken through this process. The sales pages turn visitors into customers. It demonstrates to visitors how a product or service can solve their particular problem or provide other benefits. It also helps you understand what potential customers think and do at each stage of their purchasing journey. With a proper sales funnel, you will not experience the pain of missing out on sales. In this course, Sorin Constantin, your instructor, will teach you how to create high-converting sales funnels that capture leads and turn them into customers.

To create sales pages for your product, you need the perfect tool to do the job. Do you find it difficult to code? We will teach you how to build and publish sales pages with WordPress and Elementor that are free, easy to use and do not require coding knowledge. We show you how to install WordPress, Elementor and other free add-on plugins that will help you create a sales page. Sorin will walk you through the steps of creating a landing page with powerful headings, text, images, FAQs and testimonials strong enough to convert your leads into potential customers. You will explore a variety of templates and template kits available for free on WordPress and Envato to build landing and sales pages. We will also teach you how to create a JV or affiliate page with sections like 'Coming Soon', countdown timer, opt-in or subscription forms features.

Are you a businessperson trying to create your own sales page but don't have much design experience? Or a beginner who wants to understand how to develop landing pages with images, videos and presentations? This course will help you master the sales funnel process, walking you through building the landing page and then each sales page design. We will teach you how to upload files in WordPress, which your customer can download with the 'Call to Action' button on the sales page. With WordPress and Elementor, you get an all-in-one lead generation and marketing tool to convert visitors into paying customers at zero cost. There isn't any prerequisite to taking this course. So what are you still waiting for? Enrol now and turn your landing pages into conversion machines.
